column2: During the argument the learned counsel for the Appellant submitted that this position
is  pursued  only  in  relation  to  four  assessments,  namely  Assessment  Nos.  6895484,

for  period  June,  2009,  July  2009,  August  2009  and 
6895485,  6895486,  6895487
Has the TAC erred in concluding that the agreements entered into by the Appellant with
the contractors titled "Agreement for Uprooting Old  Rubber Trees and clearing the Land"
were in fact contracts for the supply of rubber logs?  No.
